insert into five_oa_privilege_management (business_key, form_no, remark, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, dept_id, dept_name, application_man, application_man_name, application_time, flow, delegation_man, delegation_man_name, delegation_privilege, delegation_time) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delegationMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delegationManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delegationPrivilege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delegationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update five_oa_privilege_management set business_key = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_no = #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_process_end = #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, application_man = #{applicationMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, application_man_name = #{applicationManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, application_time = #{applicationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow = #{flow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delegation_man = #{delegationMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delegation_man_name = #{delegationManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delegation_privilege = #{delegationPrivilege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delegation_time = #{delegationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, business_key, form_no, remark, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, dept_id, dept_name, application_man, application_man_name, application_time, flow, delegation_man, delegation_man_name, delegation_privilege, delegation_time from five_oa_privilege_management where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, form_no, remark, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, dept_id, dept_name, application_man, application_man_name, application_time, flow, delegation_man, delegation_man_name, delegation_privilege, delegation_time from five_oa_privilege_management
order by id desc
